thread.section_title: Cult Pens Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.cultpens.com
thread.title: Geraldine Rees
thread.title_full: Cult Pens reviewed by Geraldine Rees

author: Geraldine Rees
title: Geraldine Rees
text: I have a lovely pen that ran out recently and I was unable to find a refill at any of the usual shops. Even looking online wasn't easy until I came across Cult Pens that offered the refill I was looking for (OHTO - Japanese company). Good price too. I ordered and received the refills very quickly so have no hesitation in recommending this company. Thank you so much.
